basics.name: Fan Mo
basics.summary: Researcher in AI, robotics, knowledge graphs, and multimodal perception; postdoctoral researcher with experience across Oxford, Cambridge, Nottingham, and KTH. Focus on GNNs, LLMs, digital twins, and intelligent manufacturing.

work.summary: Applied AI and graph-based models for robotic systems; research on 3D human pose estimation with multimodal fusion; GNN/knowledge-graph methods for RNA–drug discovery.
GNNs, LLMs, and RL for LCA transparency; biomedical data analytics; AI-driven systems for adaptive computing.
Predictive maintenance & anomaly detection; projects on e-traction modules and IoV; autonomy & ML for vehicle intelligence.
